references.formattedCitation: Small, Alastair, ed. An Iron Age and Roman Republican Settlement on Botromagno, Gravina Di Puglia: Excavations of 1965-1974. 2 vols. Archaeological Monographs of the British School at Rome 5. London: British School at Rome, 1992.

description: Silvium (modern Gravina in Puglia) was founded as a Greek colony. It was a town on the frontier of the Peucetii.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Botromagno/Gravina di Puglia
